name: Swarm of Poisonous Snakes
description: A writhing mass of serpents capable of delivering venomous bites, characterized by their quick and overwhelming strikes.
memorable: The ability to paralyze or kill prey with venomous bites makes them a formidable challenge.
goals: To ambush and overwhelm unsuspecting prey in their natural habitats like jungles and swamps.
relations: Often encountered in pairs or larger sizes when in swarms; related to other snake-type creatures.
environment: Commonly found in jungles, swamps, or dark caves.
strengths: Exceptional agility with a high Dexterity score and numerous condition immunities make it difficult to control.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to area effects; cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
attacks: The swarm strikes with its Bites action, inflicting piercing and poison damage in rapid succession.
most_powerful_ability: Its Swarm ability allows it to occupy a target's space and move through any opening suitable for a Tiny creature.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect nearby creatures without sight.
additional_information: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Immune to being charmed, frightened, and paralyzed among other conditions.
Can deal significant damage quickly through coordinated attacks.
Cannot gain hit points or temporary hit points.
Effective in ambush scenarios due to its size and movement capabilities.
test_queries: medium swarm of snakes in swamp
